Class AlienPlayer

  • java.lang.Object

      • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.model.AlienPlayer

  • public class AlienPlayer
extends Player
    Class that represent an alien player in the game, providing all the information needed by Game State and Game Controller
